description: Try our easy to follow Apple & Blackberry Crumble recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Apple & Blackberry Crumble Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 generous knob butter, at room temperature
3 Bramley apples, peeled, cored, and sliced
2-3 tbs caster sugar, depending on the tartness of the fruit

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 190°C. In a bowl, mix the breadcrumbs with the butter and lemon zest, and put to one side. Place the apples in a greased oven proof freezer proof dish, then stir in the blackberries, orange juice, and enough of the caster sugar to sweeten. Sprinkle the breadcrumbs on top and bake for 35-40 minutes, or until golden. Allow to cool completely, cover with cling film and then foil, and freeze.
To serve, defrost in the refrigerator overnight. Warm through in an oven preheated to 180°C for 40 minutes, or until golden brown and piping hot.
